plot: Sophie is so impressed by the actor who plays Macbeth in a performance on the local Snakeville stage, that she dreams she is Lady Macbeth while she is sleepwalking.
title: When Macbeth Came to Snakeville
plot_es: Sophie is so impressed by the actor who plays Macbeth in a performance on the local Snakeville stage, that she dreams she is Lady Macbeth while she is sleepwalking.
plot_en: Sophie is so impressed by the actor who plays Macbeth in a performance on the local Snakeville stage, that she dreams she is Lady Macbeth while she is sleepwalking.
